channel.title: Faqs on Hackathon Support
channel.description: Recent content in Faqs on Hackathon Support

item.title: Get Help
item.description: If you have questions regarding IBM Cloud, don’t hesitate to ask us on our Slack channel #ibm-support. You may also use Stack Overflow to find answers or ask questions. If you ask IBM Cloud related questions, tag it with ibm-cloud.

item.title: Create a free IBM Cloud Account
item.description: Create a free IBM Cloud Account to get access to runtimes and IBM Watson services: Follow https://ibm.biz/cloud-vs-covid19 to create an account. Ask us in our channel #ibm-support to get a unique voucher code When you received a code from us, go to the IBM Cloud Dashboard: Goto Manage > Account > Account Settings Click Apply Code Enter the voucher code and click Apply Optional: Enter your credit card data.
